thread.title: Duke-Syracuse highlights: Buzzer-beating bank shot lifts Orange in wild fashion
thread.title_full: Duke-Syracuse highlights: Buzzer-beating bank shot lifts Orange in wild fashion

author: Kyle Boone
title: Duke-Syracuse highlights: Buzzer-beating bank shot lifts Orange in wild fashion
text:
• 1 min read Update 6m ago 
With its back against the wall, Syracuse did exactly what it needed to do to get back in the NCAA Tournament conversation, taking down No. 10 Duke with a buzzer-beating 3-pointer, as seen above. 
It was a back-and-forth game down the stretch, but star John Gillon banked in the winning shot to send Syracuse to a 78-75 victory, followed, of course, by the requisite court storm. 
Duke had its seven-game win streak snapped, and continues to look capable of beating anyone or losing to anyone on a give night. Almost every game the Devils play in is in question with five minutes to go. Cuse, meanwhile, also appears capable of beating anyone on the right night, and with this victory almost sealing its spot in the dance, this probably isn’t a lower-seeded team many team want to face.
